name: Shackles Garrison Mobile theory
desc:
From personnel training to the systems within the ship, extensive and personalized modifications have been made. Incorporating the engine control system developed by the Shackles Garrison, this ship further emphasizes the mobile combat doctrine style of Shackles Garrison as a whole.

Based on ship class:
Increase the zero-flux top speed of ships %s/%s/%s/%s, while also enhancing the missile guidance capability by %s ;

Within the first %s of the ship's peak cr duration:
Depending on the ship class, zero-flux acceleration can be triggered when the flux level is below %s/%s/%s/%s.

name: Shackles Garrison fighter theory
desc: This plugin is built-in to all Shackles Garrison carriers

name: Quenching Squad
desc: The wolf follows you under the shadow, and the squadron will always follow you.

name: Modular Quenching Core
desc:
This ship is a specialized frigate-class combat vessel of the 27th Battle Group, with its specialized internal weapon modules can support certain exclusive weapons. The system of this ship has been tuned to a certain extent, and pushing it further may require additional costs.

When equipped with %s/%s, it will further reduce the ship's peak cr time.

When equipped with %s, the ship will additionally lose %s armor and structure; at the same time, it will also increase the damage of  energy weapons/ballistic weapons/missile weapons by %s.

When equipped with %s, the engine will take an additional %s damage, while increasing the maximum speed by %s.

This ship can be salvaged under any non-fatal injuries.

The standard model of the wing reduces the monthly maintenance requirements by %s.

name: #多滑移：短时间进入相位、或者以类似的方式进行机动/伪共晶：给予船体抗性，伤害减免后化为软幅能
System Module: Metastable
desc:
The modular system of the ship can be changed as needed, and after the system is turned on, the ship gains the following capabilities:

Immediately freeze time, time flow will then be slowly restored overtime.

name: System Module: Twin System
System Module: Recrystallization
desc:
The modular system of the hull can be changed as needed and have the following impacts:

Increase the ship's HP by %s , decrease the ship's armor by %s ;
At the same time, when the ship is not firing, it repairs %s of its existing HP per second and reduces the repair time of weapons and engines by %s.
Regardless of the hullmods used, the maximum amount of HP that can be repaired is %s, and the hull can only be repaired to up to %s in battle.

After the ship system is activated, the ship gains the following abilities:
Disable weapons and shields, and within a short duration, reduce all incoming damage by %s .

name: System Module: Current Carrier[READ]
desc:
The modular system of the ship can be changed as needed and have the following impacts:

Reduce the HP of ship by %s;
Add flight decks, reduce the fighter replacement rate reduction by %s , increase combat range of strike crafts by %s ;

In battle, this range bonus will be reduced as flux level increases.

All LPC not created by the ship system will immediately be destroyed.

After the ship system is turned on, the ship gains the following abilities:
Immediately replenish lost strikecrafts.

desc:
The modular tail wing of the ship can be modified as needed and has the following impacts:

Based on the actual flux level of the ship, ship system's recharge rate is increased by %s .

When the ship's system does not have charges, the system's max use is increased by %s ;

Also increase the ship's max CR by %s.

name: Engine Module: Number Coordination
desc:
The modular tail wing of the ship can be modified as needed and has the following impacts:

Based on the current peak CR time, increase the ship's maneuverability by up to %s and apply a significant damage reduction to the ship's engine before the peak CR time is reduced to zero.
